name: optimade-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) tool for querying Optimade-compatible material databases, fully configurable custom filter presets and provider endpoints.

HTTP_PROXY.description: Specify it if you need to use a http proxy.

HTTPS_PROXY.description: Specify it if you need to use a https proxy.

tools.name: query_optimade
tools.description:
Query OPTIMADE providers with a custom filter.
• If baseUrls omitted, falls back to default providers.
• Runs lint first: syntax errors block query; non‑white‑list fields only warn.

tools.name: lint_filter
tools.description: Return 'ok', 'warn: …', or 'syntax error: …' for a filter string.

tools.name: list_providers
tools.description: Fetch global public OPTIMADE provider URLs via OptimadeClient.

uvx.description: Run the server using the uvx package manager.
